basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC2592 (MIC=18.8 µg/ml), Bacillus licheniformis (MIC=9.4 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC25922 (MIC=28.1 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC27853 (MIC=37.5 µg/ml), Serratia rubidaea (MIC=28.1 µg/ml), Psychrobacter faecalis (MIC=2.3 µg/ml).Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=18.8 µg/ml).
